title: BRIEF-Greenbrier Reports Q2 EPS $1.91
text:
April 6, 2018 / 10:10 AM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Greenbrier Reports Q2 EPS $1.91 Reuters Staff 
April 6 (Reuters) - Greenbrier Companies Inc: * GREENBRIER COMPANIES INC Q2 SHR $1.91 
* GREENBRIER COMPANIES INC Q2 REVENUE $629.3 MLN VS I/B/E/S VIEW $612.7 MLN 
* GREENBRIER COMPANIES INC Q2 SHR VIEW $0.97 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* GREENBRIER COMPANIES INC - NEW RAILCAR BACKLOG AS OF FEBRUARY 28, 2018 WAS 24,100 UNITS WITH AN ESTIMATED VALUE OF $2.3 BLN 
* GREENBRIER COMPANIES INC - INCREASES QUARTERLY DIVIDEND 9% TO $0.25 PER SHARE 
* GREENBRIER COMPANIES INC - NEW RAILCAR DELIVERIES TOTALED 4,900 UNITS FOR QUARTER 
* GREENBRIER COMPANIES INC - SEES 2018 DELIVERIES WILL BE APPROXIMATELY 20,000 - 22,000 UNITS 
* GREENBRIER COMPANIES INC - SEES 2018 REVENUE WILL BE $2.4 - $2.6 BLN 
* GREENBRIER COMPANIES INC - RAISES FY 2018 EARNINGS GUIDANCE 
* GREENBRIER COMPANIES INC FY2018 SHR VIEW $4.17, REV VIEW $2.55 BLN — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* GREENBRIER COMPANIES INC - DILUTED EPS WILL BE $5.00 INCLUDING A Q2 BENEFIT OF $0.89 FROM TAX ACT IN 2018 
* GREENBRIER COMPANIES INC - ORDERS FOR 3,400 DIVERSIFIED RAILCARS WERE RECEIVED DURING QUARTER, VALUED AT OVER $265 MLN Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
